languages.text: {n}Кибелла кивает и закрывает глаза.{/n} "...Гончие Твои, бегущие по кровавому следу врагов Твоих. Не убоимся встретить конец, ибо с ним встретим мы и Тебя".
{n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are Thy hounds. We pursue the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла кивает и закрывает глаза.{/n} "...Гончие Твои, бегущие по кровавому следу врагов Твоих. Не убоимся встретить конец, ибо с ним встретим мы и Тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are hounds following the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."

{n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are Thy hounds. We pursue the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah asiente y cierra los ojos.{/n} «Somos Sus sabuesos. Rastreamos la sangre de Sus enemigos. No tememos el fin, pues cuando sobreviene es cuando nos reunimos con Él».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are Thy hounds. We pursue the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah asiente y cierra los ojos.{/n} «Somos Sus sabuesos. Rastreamos la sangre de Sus enemigos. No tememos el fin, pues cuando sobreviene es cuando nos reunimos con Él».

languages.text: {n}キベラはうなずき、目を閉じる。{/n}「我らは汝の猟犬。我らは汝の敵の血を追う。我らは終わりを恐れない。終わりを迎えることで、我らは汝と出会うのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are Thy hounds. We pursue the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラはうなずき、目を閉じる。{/n}「我らは汝の猟犬。我らは汝の敵の血を追う。我らは終わりを恐れない。終わりを迎えることで、我らは汝と出会うのだから」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈点点头，闭上了眼睛。{/n}“我们是您的猎犬，我们追逐敌人的鲜血。我们从不惧怕死亡，因为当我们面对死亡时，我们也会与您相遇。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are Thy hounds. We pursue the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈点点头，闭上了眼睛。{/n}“我们是您的猎犬，我们追逐敌人的鲜血。我们从不惧怕死亡，因为当我们面对死亡时，我们也会与您相遇。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah nickt und schließt die Augen.{/n} "Wir sind Deine Hunde. Wir verfolgen das Blut Deiner Gegner. Wir fürchten das Ende nicht, denn nach dem Ende treffen wir Dich."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are Thy hounds. We pursue the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah nickt und schließt die Augen.{/n} "Wir sind Deine Hunde. Wir verfolgen das Blut Deiner Gegner. Wir fürchten das Ende nicht, denn nach dem Ende treffen wir Dich."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah opine du chef et ferme les yeux.{/n} « Nous sommes Vos limiers. Nous traquons le sang de Vos ennemis. Nous ne craignons pas la fin, car lorsque nous la trouverons, c'est Vous que nous rejoindrons. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are Thy hounds. We pursue the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah opine du chef et ferme les yeux.{/n} « Nous sommes Vos limiers. Nous traquons le sang de Vos ennemis. Nous ne craignons pas la fin, car lorsque nous la trouverons, c'est Vous que nous rejoindrons. »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are Thy hounds. We pursue the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, başıyla onaylayıp gözlerini yumuyor.{/n} "Bizler senin kurdunuz. Düşmanlarının kanının peşine düşeriz. Ölümden korkumuz yoktur çünkü ölünce seninle tanışırız."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah nods and closes her eyes.{/n} "We are Thy hounds. We pursue the blood of Thy foes. We shall not fear the end, for in meeting the end, we meet Thee."
